content: I completed the plan discussed previously with Axic to minimize the changes in this PR, so we have a bunch of bad/dead links but everything that *can* be fixed easily should be.

author: axic3354
content: I need to catch up with all these things here, and will likely start doing that in the afternoon. As always, the weekend was gloomy and rainy, and today there's some sun, which I want to catch a bit.
